item.title: Donator Tag
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

/* A fully working yell command. Blocks muted players. Usman was here */ if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && muted == false) { // if command is ::yell, and it has more then 5 characters in it, and your not muted, then... if (donator == 1) { // if you are a donator.... yell("[Donator]["+playerName+"]: " + command.substring(5)); // set your title to donator } else if (playerRights == 0) { // if you are a player... yell("[Player]["+playerName+"]: "+ command.substring(5)); // set your title to player } else if (playerRights == 1) { // if you are a mod... yell("[Mod]["+playerName+"]: "+ command.substring(5)); // set your title to mod } else if (playerRights == 2) { // if you are an admin... yell("[Admin]["+playerName+"]: "+ command.substring(5)); // set your title to admin } else if (playerRights == 3 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Fill in the owner's name here") { // if you are an owner, but your name doesnt equal (owner's name)... yell("[Co-Owner]["+playerName+"]: "+ command.substring(5)); // set your title to co-owner } else if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Fill in the owner's name here") { // if you are an owner, and your name is (owner's name)... yell("[Owner]["+playerName+"]: " + command.substring(5)); // set your title to owner } // end the rank conditions } // end the command conditions and end the code

Read full topic
